title: Organizational Learning Project for Achieving Gender Equality in the Workplace

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Strengthening organizational learning capabilities for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields to achieve workplace gender equality.

learning_goals: Learners can quantitatively analyze the current status of gender equality in the workplace and derive problem areas.
Learners can establish gender equality improvement strategies using an organizational learning framework.
Learners can design a gender equality indicator system applying external benchmarking.
Learners can present organization-level action plans based on project outcomes.

resources: Corporate Case Studies on Gender Equality

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
